feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented personalization, gallery, error handling, and image compression changes with linked files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing styling, components, and personalization logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/text setup.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping the Valentine page with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/valentine/animat: Animated falling heart confetti using randomized particle properties.
IntersectionObserver-based wrapper that fades and slides content into view.
Hook managing motion preference with localStorage and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/person: Defines personalization content types and provides default values for text, timeline entries, captions, and photo slots.
Dialog UI for editing personalization content, handling image uploads, field updates, saving, and resetting with toast feedback.
Hook managing personalization data in localStorage with normalization, update, and reset logic.
frontend/src/components/valentine/sectio: Renders the closing message with optional confetti animation and a button to trigger a surprise.
Displays a 6‑image gallery using user-uploaded or placeholder images with captions.
Hero header showing the recipient's name, intro text, and a themed hero image.
Displays the personalized love letter paragraphs inside a styled card.
Shows a grid of personalized reasons for love, each styled in a card with an icon.
Renders a vertical timeline of relationship milestones from the personalization content.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Modal displaying a promise message using personalized content and heart-themed visuals.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Fixed navigation bar with scroll detection and smooth scrolling to page sections.
Main page orchestrating sections, personalization dialog with draft state, and surprise modal.
Wrapper applying heart-pattern background to the whole page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
Custom hook for versioned localStorage-backed state with error tracking and automatic persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a romantic color theme, typography, animations, utilities, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring up React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/imageResize.ts: Resizes and compresses image files using canvas to produce smaller JPEG data URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and utilities using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, known issues, and current state for the Valentine’s website.
